org.openbase.bco.authentication.lib

Class EncryptionHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openbase.bco.authentication.lib.EncryptionHelper

  • public class EncryptionHelper
extends Object
    A key that is used to encrypt and decrypt tickets during Kerberos authentication
    Author:
    Sebastian Fast

        Returns:
        the generated key as a byte array

        Parameters:

        Returns:

                                                              byte[] key)

        Encrypts any Object into a ByteString using a symmetric key.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be encrypted
        key - byte[] to encrypt object with
        Returns:
        Returns encrypted object as ByteString
        Throws:
        IOException - Any IO error occurring during the serialization and encryption.

      • encrypt

        public static byte[] encrypt(Serializable object,
                             byte[] key,
                             boolean symmetric)
                      throws IOException
        Encrypts any Object into a ByteString.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be encrypted
        key - byte[] to encrypt object with
        symmetric - if the encryption should use a symmetric or asymmetric key
        Returns:
        Returns encrypted object as ByteString
        Throws:
        IOException - Any IO error occurring during the serialization and encryption.

      • decryptSymmetric

        public static <T> T decryptSymmetric(com.google.protobuf.ByteString encryptedObject,
                                     byte[] key,
                                     Class<T> encryptedClass)
                              throws IOException,
                                     BadPaddingException
        Decrypt an object with a symmetric key and directly cast it to type T.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to which the encrypted object is casted
        Parameters:
        encryptedObject - the object encrypted as a ByteString
        key - the key used to decrypt the object
        encryptedClass - the class to which the decrypted object is cast
        Returns:
        the decrypted object cast as T
        Throws:
        IOException - if the encrypted data is corrupted
        BadPaddingException - if the wrong key is used for decryption
        ClassCastException - if the encrypted object can not be cast to T

      • decryptAsymmetric

                                      byte[] key,
                                      Class<T> encryptedClass)
                               throws IOException,
                                      BadPaddingException
        Decrypt an object using an asymmetric key and directly cast it to type T.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
        encryptedObject - the object encrypted as a ByteString
        key - the key used to decrypt the object
        encryptedClass - the class to which the decrypted object is cast
        Returns:
        the decrypted object cast as T
        Throws:
        IOException - if the encrypted data is corrupted
        BadPaddingException - if the wrong key is used for decryption
        ClassCastException - if the encrypted object can not be cast to T

      • decrypt

        public static <T> T decrypt(com.google.protobuf.ByteString encryptedObject,
                            byte[] key,
                            Class<T> encryptedClass,
                            boolean symmetric)
                     throws IOException,
                            BadPaddingException,
                            ClassCastException
        Decrypts a ByteString into an Object of type T.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type to which the encrypted object is casted
        Parameters:
        encryptedObject - ByteString to be decrypted
        key - byte[] to decrypt the encrypted object with
        encryptedClass - the class to which the decrypted object is cast
        symmetric - if the key is symmetric or asymmetric
        Returns:
        Returns decrypted object as Object
        Throws:
        BadPaddingException - if a wrong key is used
        IOException - if corrupted data
        ClassCastException - if the encrypted object can not be cast to T

                            BadPaddingException,
                            ClassCastException

        Parameters:
        encryptedObject - ByteString to be decrypted
        key - byte[] to decrypt the encrypted object with
        encryptedClass - the class to which the decrypted object is cast
        symmetric - if the key is symmetric or asymmetric
        Returns:
        Returns decrypted object as Object
        Throws:
        BadPaddingException - if a wrong key is used
        IOException - if corrupted data
        ClassCastException - if the encrypted object can not be cast to T

      • createCipherBlockChainingVector

        public static byte[] createCipherBlockChainingVector()
        Creates an initialized vector used for Cipher Block Chaining. Use this same vector for encryption and decryption
        Returns:
        byteArray of length 16
